entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING ENDED, Dempster (Highway)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:11 AM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Wind east 20 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:14 AM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:14 AM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries near the Ogilvie mountains. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 20. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:14 AM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023
